scripts.use-extension-config-development: cd ../sanes-browser-extension && yarn use-config-development && yarn override-config-development && cd ../sil-governance
scripts.start-staging: yarn override-config-staging && docker build --no-cache -t 'iov1/sil-governance:manual' . && docker run --read-only --rm -p 3000:3000 'iov1/sil-governance:manual'
scripts.test-e2e: yarn override-config-development && yarn use-extension-config-development && TZ=UTC LANG=en_US.UTF-8 CI=true react-scripts test '\.e2e\.(spec|test)\.[jt]s[x]?$' --env=jsdom --runInBand
scripts.test-single: yarn override-config-development && yarn use-extension-config-development && TZ=UTC LANG=en_US.UTF-8 CI=true react-scripts test --env=jsdom
scripts.deploy-staging: cp firebase.governance-staging.json firebase.json && firebase deploy --project iov-governance --only hosting:iov-governance-staging
scripts.deploy-production: cp firebase.governance-production.json firebase.json && firebase deploy --project iov-governance --only hosting:iov-governance-production
